name: Sacrifire (itch)
description:
It's year 2154.
Your hard work brought you here.

As space refugee you've got through the various adversities.

Your station can be in danger.
Unknown ships are incoming.

Are you going to beat them the hell or you just gonna give up like others did?

In our simple (and cute UwU) endless space shooter your goal is to protect your base from incoming enemies. Get the highest score and share it with us.
